about_the_game:
Evil monsters are trying to invade the last remaining village!

There are 5 areas near the village, and you will receive a reward each time you clear an area : Forest, Coast, Grave, Glacier, Hell

Advance to the next area by clearing various bosses that block movement to the next area.

You need powerful items to deal with powerful bosses.

Using the gold earned during the adventure, you can return to the village and acquire powerful equipment through gambling or strengthen items using strengthening items.

The adventure doesn't end when you become the town's hero with just one class. Share valuable items acquired during your adventure using the public warehouse.

Even now, Last Town is waiting for a new hero.

Character Custom

  • You can design hair, hair color, skin color, eyes, eyebrows, mouth, and beard as you like

Character Class

  • 3 character class : Rogue, Warrior, Paladin

  • Different wear items, ability, passive , and 7 skills for each class

Item

  • The types of items that can be equipped are different for each class

  • Item levels are divided into Normal, Magic, Rare, Unique, and Legend, and each item ability is added to Magic level or higher

  • Get items from adventures or tavern gambling and upgrade them at the Forge

Area

  • Clear the boss of each map and move on to the next area

  • Once you conquer a region, you will receive a regional reward when you successfully return to your adventure

content_descriptors.notes:
1. The bare body is depicted when not wearing armor, but it is a 2D graphic that does not accurately represent the body.

2. If your Mental Value is low in the game, recover it by using beer and wine at the inn.
